utterance.speaker: FIRST MATE
utterance.content: Captain, new contact on long range sensors. Creaver battleship closing fast.

utterance.speaker: GABRIEL WINTERS
utterance.content: Demagnify. Oracle, chances for crew survival if we engage?

utterance.speaker: ORACLE
utterance.content: All weapon systems are disabled. The alien vessel has superior firepower. Chances of survival, .1 percent.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: That’s a rosy prediction. We will live to fight another day. Prepare for flash warp.

utterance.speaker: FIRST MATE
utterance.content: Captain Max. Lieutenant Chloe hasn’t reported back from Ariel’s moon.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Hold blast warp! We’re not leaving without her.

utterance.speaker: FIRST MATE
utterance.content: But sir, if we don’t warp in time all of humanity will be lost.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: And if we don’t wait for Lieutenant Chloe, our humanity will be lost.

utterance.speaker: NAVIGATOR
utterance.content: Captain! The Creavers have fired ion torpedoes.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Shields up! Man battle stations.

utterance.speaker: NAVIGATOR
utterance.content: Impact in 9 seconds.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Status on Lieutenant Chloe?

utterance.speaker: FIRST MATE
utterance.content: She teleported, sir. She’s back on our ship.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Initiate flash warp.

utterance.speaker: PILOT
utterance.content: Initiating in 3 … 2 … 1.

utterance.speaker: PILOT
utterance.content: Warp successful.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Lieutenant Chloe. You’re back.

utterance.speaker: LIEUTENANT CHLOE
utterance.content: And so is my Thorian blaster.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: CHLOE
utterance.content: I’m with the Creavers now. And this ship is under my command.

utterance.speaker: PILOT
utterance.content: That was so freaking cool!

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Thank you for serving under me today on the Nebula-9 Fan Experience. Please, return to the dressing rooms and leave your uniforms with the attendant. And may fortune guide your journey.

utterance.speaker: NAVIGATOR
utterance.content: Check out the Oracle pod. Man, the Oracle looks so real.

utterance.speaker: FIRST MATE
utterance.content: I think she is real. And I think she’s dead.

utterance.speaker: RICHARD CASTLE
utterance.content: And … here you go.

utterance.speaker: JONATHAN FRAKES
utterance.content: Thanks. I’m your number one fan.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, thanks for coming. How far they fall.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: All right, where do you want it?

utterance.speaker: KATE BECKETT
utterance.content: Could you sign my chest?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Wow. That actually caught your attention.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You’d know if you answered your phone.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Listen, if you want your very own signed copy of Storm Season I’d be happy to arrange a private signing.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Cap your pen, Castle. There’s been a murder here.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Here at Supernova Con?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Mmhmm.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Shiny.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You gotta admit, this is a genius place to commit a murder. I mean, you don a costume, strike down your intended target, and then melt into the crowd unseen.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You sound like you’ve actually thought about this, Castle.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ah, I used to come here a lot. Alexis and I would come here every year and dress up. You should have seen her looking like a little pint sized Princess Leia.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And you were?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ah… Darth Vader, of course. So, who is our victim? Did Doc Ock finally catch up with Spiderman?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Think more TV starship.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh! Um … Borg attack?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Uh uh.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Cylon skin job? Please say Number 6.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Nope. Nebula-9.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Mmhmm.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’m sorry, but how is Nebula-9 worthy of all this? I mean, they were canceled over a decade ago after 12 episodes. Which was 12 episodes too many.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I thought you would be a fan.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’m a fan of good sci-fi. Star Trek, Battlestar, that Joss Whedon show. But Nebula-9? No, no. That’s all phony melodrama and lifeless acting.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay, this is a cool ship. The show is still lame, but this is a cool ship.

utterance.speaker: JAVIER ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yo.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hey, so who’s our vic?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Annabelle Collins. She’s 28. Looks like she was killed and then stashed in that pod. She’s the one that put together this whole Nebula-9 Fan Experience reenactment thing.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: An impressive, if misguided, effort.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: With you, bro. Give me Blade Runner. A bleak dystopian future where sexy replicates ride? How about you, Beckett? What do you –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Have you found next of kin?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Actually on my way to do that.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Perlmutter. Good to see you.

utterance.speaker: SIDNEY PERLMUTTER
utterance.content: Ah, if only the feeling were mutual.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So when was she killed?

utterance.speaker: PERLMUTTER
utterance.content: Well, based on liver temp, last night between 10 and 11PM. The bigger issue is how she was killed. Now, I believe death came by way of this rather fascinating small diameter puncture to her heart.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Stab wound.

utterance.speaker: PERLMUTTER
utterance.content: Castle, think! How would that explain the first degree burns on the skin around the wound?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, that could be powder burns from a close range gunshot.

utterance.speaker: PERLMUTTER
utterance.content: Yeah, but the burns should have gunpowder stippling. Particulates seared into the flesh. Not only that, there would be blood spatter.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So what caused the wound?

utterance.speaker: PERLMUTTER
utterance.content: No clue. Never seen anything quite like it. I should know more once I get her on the slab.

utterance.speaker: KEVIN RYAN
utterance.content: Hey. So I just finished taking witnesses' statements. Uh … none of these folks knew the victim or were here during time of death.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, we’re going to have to find witnesses that were.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Someone must have seen the killer entering or leaving the ship last night.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah, but how would we locate them? There’s thousands of people here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You know what? You could leave a message on the Nebula-9 fansite asking for anyone that was here between 10 and 11 last night and just let them know that you’re going to meet them at the front of the ship.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Nebula-9 fansite?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. I understand that they have a very loyal fan- fanbase. Is that - ?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Gabriel Winters, aka the real Captain Max Renard. He knew the victim.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Oh, I tried to talk to him but he said he needed a minute to “muse upon the fragile nature of human life”.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, his minute is up.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hi, um … Mr. Winters. I’m Detective Kate Beckett and –

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: I’m devastated.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Ravished by sorrow. Reminded me of the moment when First Officer Tate was sucked into that wormhole in episode 6.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Except in this case … someone actually died.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Now, I understand that you knew Annabelle. Do you have any idea who could have done this to her?

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: No idea. Annabelle was spectacular in every way. When Nebula-9 was canceled – unjustly, I might add – she kept interest in the show alive. How will I go on without her?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Go on living?

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Go on doing the Fan Experience. She contacted me a few months ago, asked me to be a part of this. I was thrilled to give back to the Nebula-9 community.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: When was the last time you saw her?

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: About 9 o’clock last night, after the Fan Experience ended. I went back to my hotel, stayed in for the night. Last time I saw Annabelle she was alone on the bridge.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: And may fortune guide her journey. But the show must go on. When do you think we can get this back up and running?

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Soon? –ish?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We’ll let you know. In the meantime, did you know any of Annabelle’s family members?

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Nah. But her friends Audrey and Davis run the Nebula-9 booth down on the floor. Dismissed.

utterance.speaker: AUDREY
utterance.content: It’s just so awful. She’s been my best friend since high school. She introduced me to Davis. She’s the reason we’re together.

utterance.speaker: DAVIS
utterance.content: We bonded over Nebula-9. We all loved the show, so when Annabelle started the fan club we helped out and it just kinda took off from there.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Did you notice any unusual behavior lately?

utterance.speaker: AUDREY
utterance.content: I saw her yesterday morning and she seemed really upset.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: About what?

utterance.speaker: AUDREY
utterance.content: I don’t know. All she said was that someone she had trusted had betrayed her.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Any idea who? What she involved with anyone?

utterance.speaker: AUDREY
utterance.content: Not that I know of.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Did Annabelle have any enemies?

utterance.speaker: DAVIS
utterance.content: There were those fans, the ones who sent all the threats.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What threats?

utterance.speaker: AUDREY
utterance.content: After the fan club took off, Annabelle bought the rights to the show for practically nothing and started making new Nebula-9 webisodes starring the three of us. You know, picking up where the show left off, like as a tribute.

utterance.speaker: DAVIS
utterance.content: Not everyone saw it that way. Annabelle got some pretty ugly emails.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: How ugly?

utterance.speaker: AUDREY
utterance.content: Some were death threats.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Wow, Davis wasn’t kidding about these emails. Listen to this. “Your so called webisodes desecrate the memory of Nebula-9 and you should pay the ultimate price.”

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I don’t know, Castle. Do you honestly believe that Annabelle was killed by an angry Nebula-9 fan?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I think if you like Nebula-9 you’re crazy enough to kill, yeah.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Whoa. Why are you so down on the show?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ah, okay. Well, let’s see. Because it’s cheesy, it ignores the laws of physics and good storytelling, not to mention –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, I got it. It’s Perlmutter. He’s got something for us.

utterance.speaker: HENRY BARNETT
utterance.content: Kate Beckett! K-Becks! I knew it was you!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Oh, Henry Barnett, wow. It’s been … years.

utterance.speaker: HENRY
utterance.content: Since our first semester at Stanford.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: K-Becks?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Um…

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I – I – do you think we could catch up later? I’m actually here for work.

utterance.speaker: HENRY
utterance.content: Oh, well that explains why you’re aren’t wearing your Nebula-9 outfit.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You, uh – you have a Nebula-9 outfit?

utterance.speaker: HENRY
utterance.content: Oh, she had a few. She was a mega-fan. You should have seen her as Lieutenant Chloe. Oh wait, you can. Remember that photo we all took? I brought it to get it signed.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: May I?

utterance.speaker: HENRY
utterance.content: It’s us from back in the day.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: HENRY
utterance.content: Isn’t is frackin’ awesome?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It’s frackin’ something. Henry, I need that photo.

utterance.speaker: HENRY
utterance.content: What? Why?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It’s official NYPD business. Don’t make me ask again.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So I was a Nebula-9 fan. Big deal.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, you were beyond a fan. You dressed up in costume. You.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, yes. I was a sci-fi loving, costume wearing geek. And you know what? Not ashamed of it or of Nebula-9. Despite what you think, it was an awesome show.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hmm. I’ll tell you what. I’ll forgive you your terrible taste if you … … try on that Nebula-9 costume for me.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: In your dreams.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Look at my life. My dreams come true.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Perlmutter.

utterance.speaker: PERLMUTTER
utterance.content: Detective Beckett.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Perlmutter.

utterance.speaker: PERLMUTTER
utterance.content: And non-detective Castle.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So do you have a cause of death?

utterance.speaker: PERLMUTTER
utterance.content: It was a burn. A burn that penetrated tissue, muscle, and bone, leaving this perfectly cylindrical hole.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What kind of burn does that?

utterance.speaker: PERLMUTTER
utterance.content: Well, one created by high levels of infrared radiation. The blood vessels were cauterized by the intense heat.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Are you saying –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: She was killed by a phaser?

utterance.speaker: PERLMUTTER
utterance.content: Well, as much as it pains me, Mr. Castle is largely correct. She was killed by a high intensity laserbeam.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: A real sci-fi murder at a sci-fi convention. This keeps getting better.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: How is it possible that she’s killed by a laser?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Easy. Someone shot her with a laser gun.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Real ones don’t exist, Castle.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Actually, they do. There is an advanced tactical laser that can melt a hole in a tank from 5 miles away.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Read about it. It’s as big as a truck.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes well, obviously someone has constructed a portable handheld version.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Like who?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, let’s go back to the emails of the crazed Nebula-9 fans. And when I say crazed fans, I’m not referring to you. You were a mega-fan.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Nice one coming from the guy with a life sized Boba Fett in his bathroom.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Point taken. Anyway, perhaps one of these fans, enraged by Annabelle’s blasphemous webisodes, somehow fashioned a functioning Thorian blaster and in an act of divine retribution, said killer shot Annabelle with the very weapon featured on Nebula-9.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Interesting theory, but we have interviewed all of those crazed fans and they all have alibis.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay. Well then, maybe it wasn’t a crazed fan. But the fact is, someone did zap Annabelle with some kind of laser blaster.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I will talk to ATF and see if they’ve heard of anyone possessing a …

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Laser blaster.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: … a functional laser weapon. In the meantime hopefully Ryan and Esposito have found some witnesses by posting on the fansite.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Her name is Annabelle Collins. Did you see her in this area between 10 and 11 last night?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Um, let me repeat the question.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: First of all ma’am, I must ask you, how are you keeping those leaves on there like that?

utterance.speaker: WOMAN
utterance.content: Why don’t you pull on one and find out?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Did you see her or not?

utterance.speaker: MAN
utterance.content: He only speaks Mercitonian.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Maybe you can translate for me?

utterance.speaker: MAN
utterance.content: I’m not really that fluent.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Next.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Did you see her hear between 10 and 11 last night?

utterance.speaker: WOMAN
utterance.content: Nope.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: WOMAN
utterance.content: But if there’s anything else I can do for you, here’s my number. Call me.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: You took my … pen.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Let me begin by asking if you speak English or not.

utterance.speaker: GIRL
utterance.content: Obvi.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Okay. Did you see this woman between 10 and 11 last night?

utterance.speaker: GIRL
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: You did?

utterance.speaker: GIRL
utterance.content: Yeah. My friends and I were totes pissed at her because she told us that the Fan Experience was closed. And then two seconds later she brought someone inside here.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Could you describe who she was with?

utterance.speaker: GIRL
utterance.content: I could do lots better. I can tell you her name.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Stephanie Frye. The actress who played your personal hero Lieutenant Chloe in the original Nebula-9 series?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: A witness says Annabelle and Stephanie walked onto the spaceship set around 9:45.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, did she see either one of them after that?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Stephanie’s a big movie star now. She’s not even involved with Nebula-9. What possible motive could she have?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: All I know is that she was one of the last people to see Annabelle alive, so I have to talk to her.

utterance.speaker: STEPHANIE FRYE
utterance.content: I was sad to hear about Annabelle. I met her a few times at conventions like this. She seemed lovely.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We have a witness that saw you and Annabelle go into the ship just before she died.

utterance.speaker: STEPHANIE
utterance.content: You don’t think –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We’re just trying to figure out what happened.

utterance.speaker: STEPHANIE
utterance.content: Nothing happened. We talked. It was a quick conversation. I had to be on the red carpet at 10.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What did you talk about?

utterance.speaker: STEPHANIE
utterance.content: Ugh. She asked if I’d be part of this weekend’s Nebula-9 Fan Experience.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, but you distanced yourself from the show. Didn’t you? I … heard that you did.

utterance.speaker: STEPHANIE
utterance.content: Don’t get me wrong. Playing Lieutenant Chloe was my big break, but … Nebula-9? Not exactly a career launcher.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: STEPHANIE
utterance.content: Now that I’m finally being taken seriously as an actress I couldn’t go back. It would harm my image.

utterance.speaker: STEPHANIE
utterance.content: So I told Annabelle no. She understood.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, I’m not sure I do. Why would she even ask if she knew you’d refuse?

utterance.speaker: STEPHANIE
utterance.content: She was desperate. She said she’d have to shut it down if she didn’t have an original cast member.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, but what about Captain Max? Gabriel Winters. She had him, didn’t she?

utterance.speaker: STEPHANIE
utterance.content: Gabriel is a complicated guy. I mean, she didn’t go into detail, but she was having problems with him.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: She was having problems with him, all right. Word is Gabriel was showing up late to the Fan Experience and drunk.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Captain Max was drunk?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Well, among other transgressions. He was actually a no-show to the Nebula-9 yesterday and Annabelle had to rouse him from his hotel room where he was passed out naked with two Lieutenant Chloes.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ha. I’d say fortune was definitely guiding his journey.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Just because he exhibited some bad behavior doesn’t mean that was motive for murder.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Well, except that I just spoke with Gabriel’s agent. Annabelle called her yesterday threatening to fire him.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And so he killed her?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Well here’s the thing. The guy’s a washed up actor. He’s barely worked since the show was canceled and he does what, 20 Fan Experiences a day at $500 bucks a shot. If Annabelle took that away from him, he’d have nothing.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay guys, thanks.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Annabelle said she was betrayed by someone she trusted. Maybe that was Captain Max.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh my God! Alexis?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS CASTLE
utterance.content: Dad? What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What are you doing here … dressed like that?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: We’re Havakura. It’s a tribe of female assassins who –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Don’t wear clothes?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: You’re overreacting. And you’re embarrassing me.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, I’m embarrassing you? I’m the one who’s dressed –

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Dad!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle. C’mon, let’s go.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Are you kidding me? Did you see what she’s wearing?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, it’s not that bad.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Not that bad? How am I gonna unsee that?

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Chances for crew survival if we engage?

utterance.speaker: ORACLE
utterance.content: All weapon systems are disabled. The alien vessel has superior firepower. Chances of survival, .1 percent.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: That’s a rosy prediction.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: We will live to fight – Ah, we have visitors. Wearing 21st century garb. You come in peace, or is this more Creaver trickery?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: NYPD, sorry folks, we’re going to have to cut this short. Everyone out.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: This is outrageous. I included you in the Nebula-9 Fan Experience and you ruined it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Mr. Winters, where were you last night between 10 and 11? And don’t say your hotel room.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: You can’t be insinuating I had something to do with Annabelle’s death? I told you everything I know.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Then you wouldn’t mind relinquishing your weapon.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: This Thorian blaster was given to me by the Vice Chancellor of Lloron when I helped save the Queen –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, for the love of Pete. Zap, said the lady. You are so busted.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Hey. So our ballistics guys got together with – – Perlmutter and tested the blaster. It’s definitely our murder weapon.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I want to build an ironclad case against this guy. Have tech look at the gun, find out where it came from.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: As you wish.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You know, I can see how Annabelle felt betrayed. Some guys have no business commanding a spaceship.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Just goes to show you sometimes people aren’t what they appear to be.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: For Alexis’ sake I hope you’re right, given what she was wearing.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, she is a full grown woman.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Who as we speak is being ogled by thousands of sweaty, lecherous fanboys. It’s just so … wrong.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Can I just point out the fact that the costume that she was wearing is not so different from the one that you are asking me to wear?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Don’t say that! That – so confusing and disturbing.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Look, I have no idea where that blaster came from.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That’s funny, since it was on your hip.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: I grabbed it off the props table when I suit up, just like I always do. I didn’t know it was real. Wait, you guys think I killed her and then kept the murder weapon on me? What kind of idiot does that?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Why didn’t you tell us that you were having problems with Annabelle?

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: I played a lawyer in a well-regarded film that didn’t come out. I know about the legal system. That would have just made me look guilty.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: As opposed to how you look now?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Look, here’s what I think. Annabelle got tired of your drunken carousing and threatened to fire you from the only job that you had, so you killed her.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: None of that is true. Except maybe the carousing part.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So she didn’t threaten to fire you?

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Yes, sure, all the time. But she’d never go through with it. I’m the face of Nebula-9. I’m the reason all those lunatics line up for days outside the convention.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes, well, perhaps now they’ll line up outside Sing-Sing.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Annabelle and I clashed on certain … lifestyle choices. But we had an understanding. I even got her and her boyfriend into the opening night party on Wednesday.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Nice try, she didn’t have a boyfriend.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Told me she did.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Look, the fact is you had means, motive, and opportunity. And we checked with your hotel. You left at 9:45PM and returned at 11. That’s the exact time window of Annabelle’s murder.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: I was busy handling a personal issue that I would, uh, rather not discuss.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You are facing a murder charge.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay, look. We already know about the threesome with the Lieutenant Chloes. How bad can it be?

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Well let’s just say my, um … weakness for fleeting romance left me with a burning desire to see my doctor last night.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And it just got worse.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: So, the doctor confirms his alibi. He was dosing Gabriel with antibiotics during our time of death window.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Gabriel said that Annabelle went to the party with her boyfriend. But there’s no evidence that she was in a relationship. There’s nothing in her emails, phone calls, or texts.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: And the very next day she said someone had betrayed her trust. Maybe she meant the secret boyfriend.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Whoever he is he never came forward and that is suspicious.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yo. Our tech guys caught a break. They took apart the gun and they traced the serial number on one of the components. Manufacturer shipped it to an address in the Bronx.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: All right, Castle and I’ll go check this out. You guys go to the convention center bar where the party was being held and see if you can ID who Annabelle was with.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: This is like the Halloween from hell.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Oh yeah, this is probably too lowbrow for you, huh? You’re probably into that boring-ass, intellectual kind of sci-fi like Gattaca or 2001. The Monolith? What the hell was that?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Don’t ask me. I don’t know. Swords and sorcery, that’s more my thing. Like uh … Lord of the Rings.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah, I could probably see you as an elf. Or a hobbit.

utterance.speaker: BARTENDER
utterance.content: Yeah, served her and her date in a private room. Looked pretty cozy but later she was alone at the bar crying her eyes out.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: This date of hers, can you describe him?

utterance.speaker: BARTENDER
utterance.content: Sure can. Looked like that.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: A Creaver?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: A who?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: The evil alien race from Nebula-9. Nasty creatures. They’ll eat your face off when you’re still alive and then serve your organs to their young.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Good to know. Is that all?

utterance.speaker: BARTENDER
utterance.content: Had one of these purple VIP badges. Pretty exclusive. Can’t be more than a few hundred of them.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: “Danger, do not enter.” That is just the sort of sign you’d expect to see on the lair of an evil laser gun making genius.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s pitch black inside but the door is partially open. I would say that’s an invitation, wouldn’t you?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Just in case it isn’t.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: NYPD, anyone here?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Perhaps we should have heeded that very wise sign.

utterance.speaker: COMPUTER
utterance.content: Raise your hands! Prepare to die.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: NYPD, put down your weapons!

utterance.speaker: BENJAMIN DONNELLY
utterance.content: Did you see that? It worked perfectly. It’s modeled on the targeting system of a Machbarien Star Destroyer.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So I take it we’re not going to die.

utterance.speaker: DONNELLY
utterance.content: From remote controlled laser pointers? No. But it’s perfect to scare away intruders. You should have seen the UPS guy. He almost wet himself.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Excuse me, Mr. –

utterance.speaker: DONNELLY
utterance.content: Donnelly. Benjamin Donnelly. Purveyor of sci-fi hardware for the discriminating enthusiast. So, what can I interest you in? A Klingon bat’leth, perhaps? A Cylon laser pistol? A double bladed lightsaber?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You have a double bladed lightsaber?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Actually, we’re looking for a Thorian blaster.

utterance.speaker: DONNELLY
utterance.content: Oh. The woman has taste. Plasma pistol with a triskellion core. Accurate down to the last detail.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Including its ability to kill?

utterance.speaker: DONNELLY
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We’re investigating a murder. And we traced the weapon back to you.

utterance.speaker: DONNELLY
utterance.content: I created this for entertainment use only. I never intended for it to hurt anybody. Thorian blasters don’t kill. People do.

utterance.speaker: DONNELLY
utterance.content: I can’t be responsible once they leave my shop.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes, well, that is an amazing piece of weaponry. That I never want to fire again.

utterance.speaker: DONNELLY
utterance.content: Wait, you fired it?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh yeah.

utterance.speaker: DONNELLY
utterance.content: Were you wearing proper protection?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What? No – why? Why – what kind of protection?

utterance.speaker: DONNELLY
utterance.content: You’ll be fine.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: How many of those have you sold?

utterance.speaker: DONNELLY
utterance.content: I only made two that were fully functional. One in the case here, the other I sold to a collector Wednesday night.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you have a name?

utterance.speaker: DONNELLY
utterance.content: Sam? Seth? Simon? Something s-ey.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You think you could describe him?

utterance.speaker: DONNELLY
utterance.content: No, he was in costume.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Let me guess. Creaver?

utterance.speaker: DONNELLY
utterance.content: Yeah. He drove away in a white SUV if that helps. I didn’t get the numbers but they were North Carolina plates. “First in flight.”

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What kind of protection?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So Ryan and Esposito are running down everyone that was issued a purple pass to see if they can ID our Creaver. They should have something by tomorrow morning. I mean, it’s just like you said, Castle. That costume allowed our killer to strike unseen. And of course he’s going to be a Creaver. I mean, they’re the sworn enemies of the Nebula-9 crew.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Do I look different to you?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No. Why?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Just – I feel so tingly. Something’s wrong. I’m beginning to mutate like the Hulk or The Thing. Or worse, the Leader. What’ll happen to my hair?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I prefer Doctor Manhattan. The blue skin. Brings out your blue eyes.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: This isn’t funny. What if firing that blaster made me infertile?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You want more kids?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, I’d like the option.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, I think you’re going to be fine, Castle.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: All the same, I should decontaminate. Take a Silkwood shower.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Alexis, what are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: I thought maybe after what happened that you’d want to talk about it.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No. Me – no. You?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yo.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Hey, so we found out that valet parking comes with those purple passes. And there was only one attendee that had a white SUV with North Carolina plates. Simon Westport. He was on 295 heading south when state troopers pulled him over. He had a Creaver outfit in his trunk.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you recognize this, Simon?

utterance.speaker: SIMON WESTPORT
utterance.content: It’s a Thorian blaster.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You know what else it is? It’s the gun that killed Annabelle Collins.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Bought by a guy dressed as a Creaver who was seen with the victim before she died.

utterance.speaker: SIMON
utterance.content: This is not what it looks like. I bought that for her as a gift.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You bought her a live fire collectable laser gun as a gift?

utterance.speaker: SIMON
utterance.content: I did not kill her! I didn’t even know she was dead until the police told me.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What was your relationship to the victim?

utterance.speaker: SIMON
utterance.content: I met Annabelle at Supernova Con like 5 years ago. We just clicked. Look, at the Con you can be anyone you want to be for a few days so we’d hook up. It was a ‘same time next year’ kinda thing.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: So how does that square with you leaving her at the bar crying?

utterance.speaker: SIMON
utterance.content: Okay, something did happen at the party that night, but not with me. I gave her the blaster. She was thrilled. I left to take a phone call. I come back and there’s a guy hassling her.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: About what?

utterance.speaker: SIMON
utterance.content: I don’t know, but he tried to kiss her. She slapped him in the face. By the time I got to her he had already taken off. But she’s all upset about it, she tells me she needs space. So she takes the blaster and leaves. So I track her down the next day to see if she’s okay and out of nowhere she says that she’s done with Supernova Con and she’s done with me. So I checked out of my hotel and I left.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Can you describe this guy?

utterance.speaker: SIMON
utterance.content: Yeah. It’s the guy she did those webisodes with. Davis.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: So it sounds like whatever happened between Davis and Annabelle really did a number on her. All of a sudden she was ready to ditch Simon and the convention.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We talked to Davis. He never mentioned any incident.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Which means he’s hiding something.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Either that or he killed her.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey, tell me you guys, do you think my hair is thinning?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You’re not losing your hair, Castle.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay, so if I wake up bald tomorrow you’ll still be attracted to me? Oh my God, you wouldn’t!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I didn’t say that.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, but you were thinking it. I can see it in you –

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: With that pumpkin head? Dude.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Davis, what was your relationship with Annabelle Collins?

utterance.speaker: DAVIS
utterance.content: I told you before. We were friends.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Was friendship enough or did you want more?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Witnesses saw you with Annabelle at the opening night party. It sounds like she didn’t respond too well to your advances.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Why would she? I mean, you were already in a relationship with her best friend.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Why would you risk it all by making a pass at her?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, one reason. Love. But you were with Audrey.

utterance.speaker: DAVIS
utterance.content: I was. I am. But it was always Annabelle.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Why don’t you tell us what happened?

utterance.speaker: DAVIS
utterance.content: That night I had had a few drinks and I saw her with that … Creaver at the party and they were all over each other. And it killed me. I couldn’t take it anymore, I had to tell her how I felt, and she – she said terrible things. She said that I ruined everything, that she was going to have to tell Audrey and … I didn’t know what else to do.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Davis, did you kill Annabelle?

utterance.speaker: DAVIS
utterance.content: No. No, I was halfway across the building when it happened at the masquerade ball. You can check. But I tried to make things right with her. I told her I was drunk and we should just forget about it, but she couldn’t. She said it was one thing to live a fantasy but she wasn’t going to live a lie. And that this was going to be our last Con.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: She was going to end the Fan Experience?

utterance.speaker: DAVIS
utterance.content: Not just the Fan Experience. Everything. She said it was time to move on. She decided to cash out and sell the rights to Nebula-9. I mean, they were worthless when she first got them, but she – she made the show popular again. They were talking about rebooting the series, maybe even doing a movie.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That would mean some real money.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Davis, who gets the rights now that Annabelle’s dead?

utterance.speaker: DAVIS
utterance.content: They go to Audrey.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So Davis’ alibi checks out. Sort of.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Sort of?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, organizers confirm that he arrived at the party at 9:30 but everyone was masked, so he could have slipped out at any time.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Hey, so Annabelle was serious about cashing out. She had an offer on the table from Epic Scope Productions.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: She’d been refusing to sell for months but the day she died she put in a call saying she was ready to make that deal.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: For how much?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Two and a half million dollars.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That’s motive.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s madness. $2.5 mil for that god awful show?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: But now that she’s dead, they’re going to have to pay Audrey.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: And she didn’t even wait for the body to get cold. The morning after Annabelle was killed Audrey put in a call to Epic Scope.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: They closed the deal today.

utterance.speaker: AUDREY
utterance.content: Yeah, I sold the rights. So what? All this? This is all Annabelle. What’s the point of doing it without her?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Except you weren’t going to be doing it with her much longer, were you?

utterance.speaker: AUDREY
utterance.content: I don’t know what you mean.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You worked for years helping Annabelle bring Nebula-9 back to life.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: If she sold the rights, all this would go away leaving you with nothing. And you couldn’t let her do that, could you?

utterance.speaker: AUDREY
utterance.content: That is a disgusting thing to say. She was my best friend.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Where were you the night she was killed?

utterance.speaker: AUDREY
utterance.content: I’m not going to answer any more of your questions.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Let’s make sure that history never forgets the name Enterprise.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, okay. Thanks Ryan. So Audrey’s hotel keycard was used at 9:48PM and then it wasn’t used again the rest of the night.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well she could have slipped out and left her door ajar. That would have given her enough time to get down here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, but Castle all I we have is circumstantial evidence and soft alibis. We’ve got to get something more concrete. I can’t tell you how many times I have had dreams about being in this very ship.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Sexy dreams? You know, it’s never too late to live out your fantasy.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You do realize that this is still a crime scene?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, right. Ew.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You’re right, okay? It was a stupid show. It was cheesy and melodramatic. I mean, a handful of academy mission and suddenly the Earth is destroyed and they’re all that’s left of humanity? I completely understand why you hated it. But Castle, I also understand why people loved it. Why Annabelle loved it. It was about leaving home for the first time. About searching for your identity and making a difference. I loved dressing up like Lieutenant Chloe. She didn’t care what anybody thought about her. And I kinda did, at that time. I mean, she was a scientist and a warrior and that was all in spite of the way she looked. It was like I could be anything and I didn’t have to choose. So don’t make fun, okay?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And besides, it didn’t hurt that my legs looked great in her outfit.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, of that I have no doubt – ow!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What’s wrong?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: My hand!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What – whoa – I mean, what does that mean?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That means you just solved our case.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thank you everyone for coming in today.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: I was under the impression I didn’t have a choice.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You didn’t.

utterance.speaker: SIMON
utterance.content: I don’t understand. What are we doing here?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Everyone in this room had a relationship with the victim. Each of you had either motive or opportunity to kill her. Uh, Miss Frye, would you do me the honor of a little improvisation?

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Trust me, that woman needs a script.

utterance.speaker: STEPHANIE
utterance.content: I’m happy to help.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Miss Frye will be Annabelle Collins, I will be the killer. Annabelle had the weapon on her the night she died. Don’t worry, this one’s just a toy. Now, the killer confronts Annabelle. Annabelle, presumably to protect herself, drew her blaster. They struggled for the gun. The killer overpowers – – I need – I need you to resist just a little less.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Told you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And breaks free the weapon. Annabelle was slain by her own Thorian blaster. Zap.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Overacting much?

utterance.speaker: STEPHANIE
utterance.content: Shut up, Gabriel.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: At that point the killer stashed Annabelle’s body in the Oracle pod not knowing that by firing the Thorian blaster they were leaving behind crucial evidence.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: The energy emission from the gun left a superficial burn on the killer’s skin which is visible under UV light.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Branding our murderer with the mark of Cain. Or for you Nebula-9 fans, the mark of Kaldaresh.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Simon, could you step forward, please? Could you hold out your hands?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thank you. Davis?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Your left hand as well.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thank you. Audrey.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Mr. Winters?

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Look, I um – I can explain.

utterance.speaker: AUDREY
utterance.content: It was you?

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: No! I have an alibi.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Alibis can be bought.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: I didn’t kill Annabelle.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Then why is your hand glowing?

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Because. I found out some nerd was making real Thorian blasters I figure if anyone should have on it should be me. I’m Captain Max! So I tracked him down and I bought the last one. This is from this morning. I shot it in my hotel room. There’s a hole in the wall. You can check.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Stephanie, where are you going?

utterance.speaker: STEPHANIE
utterance.content: I was just gonna –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hold it right there!

utterance.speaker: STEPHANIE
utterance.content: You heard the man! This one’s deadly. Nobody moves or I put a hole in his head.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Am I the only one that finds this situation eerily familiar?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Stephanie? Why?

utterance.speaker: STEPHANIE
utterance.content: You know how long I have worked to get away from Lieutenant Chloe? To get away from the stench of this show? The Fan Experience was bad enough. But she was going to sell the rights and it was going to start all over again. The movies, the product lines, Lieutenant Chloe bobble heads. Do you know how hard I worked to make something of myself? To become a real actress?

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Oh come on, Steph. You can’t act your way out of a paper bag.

utterance.speaker: STEPHANIE
utterance.content: The only solace I have is this time when I kill you there’s not an Endorian empath to bring you back from the dead.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: I don’t think so.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Been waiting 10 years to do that, *****. Nobody takes over my ship.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Oh, it’s a lot easier when the stunt guys do it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you realize how lucky you are? You could have gotten yourself killed.

utterance.speaker: WINTERS
utterance.content: Not even. Had it on stun.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Stephanie Frye, you’re under arrest for the murder of Annabelle Collins.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Um, um, um, um. May I?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And may fortune guide your journey.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Doctor says my hand’s going to stop glowing in a few days.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So no mutant powers?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, not this time. At least my hair’s not falling out.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What about you? How’re you doing?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m fine. Why?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, it’s hard to see your idols fall.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Oh Castle, Stephanie Frye was never my idol. Lieutenant Chloe was. And as far as I’m concerned, she’s still out there fighting evil and saving humanity. And no self-centered actor is gonna take that from me. And you know what? If they do make a movie I’m going to be first in line to see it.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ah, such is the power of fantasy. And speaking of fantasies, how about we live out one of yours? What do you say to a little Nebula-9 cosplay? C’mon, it’ll be fun. I’ll serve you breakfast in bed for a week. And I’ll do your laundry.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, fine. Do you really want to see me in one of my old costumes?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes please.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Then you have to promise that you’re going to watch a Nebula-9 marathon with me.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And no making fun.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You drive a hard bargain, but okay.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’ll see you at your place.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, promise not to laugh.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I promise. C’mon, quit stalling. Come out already.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Ready?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ready.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you like it?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s not what you – that’s not –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You want to make out, Castle? Rawr.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, that’s –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: C’mon. Just a quick snog, right here on the lips.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Isn’t this what your dreams are made of? Rawr!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle? Are we going to make out?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Maybe we … should start with the … Nebula-9 marathon.

utterance.speaker: THE END
utterance.content: CASTLE
